title: Drawing, Designs for Storage Tables, 1980s
medium: Graphite, yellow crayon on white paper
description: Eleven designs for low storage tables of various shapes.  In upper row, reading left to right:  rectangular table with handle on short end and window on front side; semi-spherical table with handle on front side; triangular table with curved sides and handle in front.  Second row across:  irregularly shaped table (unfinished); piano shaped table; irregular geometric shaped table; low rectangular table (partial).  Third row across:  pie-shaped table with grommets on corners; rectangular table with saw-tooth back; rectangular table cut diagonally in two parts.  Fourth row across:  irregular, geometric shaped table with window on front end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Designs for Storage Tables, 1980s. Graphite, yellow crayon on white paper. 
Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-341
